metadata.dc:author: Guillén García, Pedro
metadata.dc:description: In the last years a number of different tools which will be commonly used in the future have merged. Among them, the use of therapeutical cells (Cell Therapy) or the use of bio-active molecules after the identification of the molecular basis of a given pathology (Molecular Medicine), are two approaches. Currently, the autologous chondrocyte implantation to treat the articular cartilage lesions is considered as a consolidated therapy.
metadata.dc:title: Medicina celular y molecular en las lesiones del sistema músculo esquelético (deporte). (Células para curar).
[Cell and molecular medicine in musculoskeletal system lession (sports) (healing cells)].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales de la Real Academia Nacional de Medicina
